[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/dsl](./dsl.md) &gt; [TableBuilderOptions](./dsl.tablebuilderoptions.md)

## TableBuilderOptions interface

Options for the table component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface TableBuilderOptions 
```

## Remarks

Configure the table's columns, data, dimensions, and behavior when creating a table component.
